## Type of Change

<!-- Mark the relevant option with an 'x' -->

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update (changes to documentation only)
- [ ] Code refactoring (no functional changes)
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Build/CI configuration change
- [ ] Other (please describe):

## Testing

<!-- Mark the relevant options with an 'x' -->

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] All new and existing tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have run the full test suite using `uv run pytest`
- [ ] I have verified test coverage is maintained or improved
- [ ] I have tested the changes manually (if applicable)

## Documentation

## Code Quality

<!-- Mark the relevant options with an 'x' -->

- [ ] My code follows the project's code style guidelines
- [ ] I have run `uv run black .` to format my code
- [ ] I have run `uv run ruff check .` and fixed all linting issues
- [ ] I have run `uv run mypy .` and fixed all type checking issues
- [ ] I have removed any debugging code or print statements
- [ ] I have added comments to complex or non-obvious code sections
